==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=衫短裤阔人矮鼻直}}

===Etymology===
A phrase comprising words pronounced with the first tone to the eighth tone respectively in Min Nan.

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|mn=saⁿ té khò͘ khoah lâng é phīⁿ ti̍t
|cat=ph
}}

===Phrase===
{{zh-phrase}}

# {{lb|zh|Min Nan}} {{non-gloss definition|A phrase used to memorise the eight tones in Min Nan.}} the [[clothes]] [are] [[short]], the [[pants]] [are] [[broad]], the [[person]] [is] [[short]], the [[nose]] [is] [[straight]].

====Usage notes====
In many dialects of Min Nan, the second tone and the sixth tone have merged.
